    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e)
      ActionPerformed method from the ActionListener interface
      void init(ObserverActionParameters params)
      Function that maps the metadata information from the openBIS and data viewers (when they notify being ready) and creates and renders all required UI widgets for metadata editing.
      void updateAll(ObserverActionParameters observerActionParams)
      Function that updates the metadata and the UI widgets when the user edits something in the editor.
      boolean updateDataModel()
      Once the metadata has been completely filled, this method makes sure to update the data model (generated by the Processor) to be ready to be saved to the XML properties file.
